name: Linden Honey
description: Has a gentle linden aroma and a light minty aftertaste. Excellent for colds and coughs.

name: Buckwheat Honey
description: Dark and rich, high in iron. Has a distinctive tart taste.

name: Flower Honey
description: Collected from meadow flowers. Light, fragrant, and versatile.

name: Acacia Honey
description: Very light, with a subtle taste and slow crystallization. Suitable even for children.

name: Taiga Honey
description: Collected in the ecologically clean areas of Siberia. Has a complex taste and powerful antiseptic properties.
